author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Re: Lupin On The Top Ten!
body:
"lain is the Blade Runner of anime,"

It's got the feel of Blade Runner, though A.D. Police is the only real 
cyberpunk anime IMHO.

"and just like Ridley Scott didn't come out in the film and say "Decker is a 
replicant!","

He did a few months ago. ^^

"the creators of lain didn't come out and say what lain is.  This is what 
makes lain and Blade Runner great sci-fi."

I enjoyed Lain a lot, but was that scene with Arisu-um-cybering with her 
teacher necessary? I mean that on scene kind of ruined the strength of the 
anime for me. *spoiler if I can interpret it right* The whole computer 
universe falls apart just cus Lain KNOWS Arisu's secret?! Cmon. Give me a 
more mature impetus than that. Other than that gripe, I had no problem with 
Lain.
